name: Bullet Inferno (Demo)
description:
Fight your way through 8 unique bosses with unique fighting patterns and attacks.  Classic bullet hell mechanics with clean movement, shooting, and controls.

Follow me on youtube to see videos of new bosses and changes to the game that will be implemented to the demo soon!

Have a tumblr?  I do too!  Feel free to check out my dev stuff there where I post about Bullet Inferno and things I'll be adding.  If you have any criticisms, I'll be sure to respond to your comment in this games comment section and maybe address it on my blog if I think it'd be good to share!
https://dreadusagames.tumblr.com/

https://discord.gg/86bYD5y

I have a discord for the games I work on now, feel free to join but read the rules first and be sure to ask me anything regarding the rules before you start chatting with others!

IF RESTARTING DOESN'T WORK, THAT BUILD WAS UP FOR ONE MINUTE, PLEASE REDOWNLOAD THE NEW BUILD!
